Comment: The response provides a comprehensive and doctrinally sound explanation of the difference between worshiping God and worshiping false gods. The use of relevant scriptures also strengthens the theological underpinnings of the answer. Overall, this response demonstrates a solid understanding of Christian beliefs on worship. Great job!
